content: {"name": "St. Thomas United Methodist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clothing from the Community Clothes Closet is distributed on the 3rd and 4th Saturdays with the food.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.stthomasumc.org/serveinthefoodpantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "8899 Sudley Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Manassas", "state_province": "VA", "postal_code": "20110", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.764192, "longitude": -77.478443}, "phones": [{"number": "(703) 368-5161", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}]}
